detail_desc: Sleeveless top in a slightly crinkled viscose weave. Narrow cut at the top with a small opening front and back and a button at the back of the neck. Spaghetti shoulder straps and a decorative pompom trim around the armholes.
Nylon jacket with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.

Padded all-in-one suit in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, faux fur-trimmed, padded hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, elastication at the back and reinforced sections at the back and knees. Small zipped pocket at the top, covered elastication at the cuffs and hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Reflective details. Lined. The all-in-one suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with covered elastication at the waist, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Trousers in sturdy, patterned jersey with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Plastic water bottle with a handle and a non-drip lid with a straw.
Jacket in soft, marled sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered drawstring hood, and a zip down the front and at the sides. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Non-wired push-up bralette in lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.

Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck and flounces at the top. Lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, adjustable shoulder straps and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The polyamide and polyester content of the swimsuit are recycled.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh racer back and elasticated hem. Lined at the front.
Short jacquard-weave skirt with a concealed zip in one side.
Straight-cut coat in woven fabric with a high collar and buttons down the front. Diagonal, welt side pockets, two inner pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Side pockets, a fake fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Soft jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Wide jumper in a soft, rib knit containing some wool with a V-neck at the front and long sleeves.
Skirt in cotton chambray with covered elastication at the waist and gathered tiers.
Longer-style, fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short skirt in imitation patent leather with a visible zip at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Dog jacket in a reflective weave with a hood and a hole for a leash at the back of the neck. Opening for the front legs and a hook and loop fastening underneath. Fleece lining.

Short, fitted dress in washed denim with a collar and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, pockets in the side seams and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Rounded hem. Unlined.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a turned-up hem.
Fully lined one-shoulder swimsuit with a cut-out section at the front and side.

Trousers in sturdy cotton twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets. Wide, cropped legs with one leg pocket that has a pleat and one leg pocket that has a flap and decorative zip.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Bras in microfibre and mesh with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short skirt in imitation leather with a sewn-in wrapover at the front that fastens with a tab and metal rings. Asymmetric hem at the front. Lined.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with unlined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hem. No fasteners.
Short, A-line skirt in a jacquard weave with a concealed zip.
Double-breasted pea coat in woven fabric with wide notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.
T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Set with a skirt with straps in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and a top in cotton jersey. Skirt with a print motif and appliqué on the front, an elasticated waist and straps that cross at the back with adjustable fasteners. Top with short, frilled sleeves and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Satin dressing gown with a sewn-in tie belt and concealed tie at the waist.
T-shirt in soft jersey with raw edges.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset,wide sides and string back.
Jumper in soft, fine, rib-knit wool containing some cashmere with a round neckline, gently dropped shoulders and wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs.
Shorts in patterned jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets.

Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey. Racer back with a horizontal strap at the back of the neck and crossover shoulder straps with an open section at the back. Rounded hem. The polyester content of the vest top is partly recycled.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in stretch, cotton-blend jersey with a collar and button placket. Slim fit.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, low crotch, side pockets, a welt back pocket and short legs. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with a boat neck and short, open sleeves with ties. Unlined.
Short dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck, short, cuffed balloon sleeves and a seam under the bust with narrow, detachable ties. Unlined.
Fine-knit hat in soft yarn with a roll edge.
Blouse in a stretch weave with a boat neck, wide 3/4-length sleeves with a scalloped trim, and a scalloped hem.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, wide foldover edge at the top, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Straight, knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a wrapover top and V-neck with a hook-and-eye fastener. Long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and skirt with pleats. Unlined.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a racer back.
Jersey T-shirt dress in a soft viscose and cotton blend with a V-neck and decorative studs.
Jumper in a fine-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads with a round neck, sewn-on bow at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft, ribbed cotton jersey. Top with a rib-trimmed neckline and short sleeves with overlocked edges. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist and overlocked hems.
Wide trousers in a cool weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.

Straight-cut blouse in soft silk with buttons at the top and a knot detail that adds life and texture to the front. Seam at the hips, long sleeves with a pleat, wide cuffs with a slit and button, and a rounded hem.
Ankle-length, 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details and embroidery. High waist, zip fly and button and straight legs that flare at the hems.
Patterned swimsuit with a frill at the top and on the shoulder straps, and a small bow at the back. Lined gusset.

Shopper in braided paper straw with two wooden handles at the top and a narrow, detachable shoulder strap in imitation leather with a carabiner hook at each end. One zipped inner compartment and a sturdy base in imitation leather. Lined. Depth 14 cm. Height 29 cm. Width 37 cm.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elastication around the top.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.

Short-sleeved romper suit in striped, slub-weave cotton with buttons down the front, an elasticated seam at the waist, patch pockets at the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Opening with press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (not in sizes 1-4Y).
Jumper in a rib knit containing glittery threads with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless jumper in a rib knit with a small stand-up collar.
Metal earrings with a hanging hoop and a patterned plastic rod-shaped pendant at the bottom. Length 6 cm.
Shorts in a patterned weave with a high, elasticated waist.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit. Fleece lining.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a hood, zip down the front and front pockets.
Wide trousers in sturdy jersey with concealed elastication at the waist and straight legs.

Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and rubber soles.
Calf-length, A-line skirt in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a slightly wider, ribbed neckline, long raglan sleeves and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sandals with scuba fabric foot straps that have a plastic clip fastener at the top. Moulded imitation leather insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbed panels at the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slim Fit.
Dress in a soft, checked cotton weave with a lace-trimmed collar and buttons at the top. Short, lace-trimmed sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and patch front pockets with lace details. Unlined.
V-neck top in airy jersey made from recycled polyester. Buttons at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
